title: Develop New Client Portal
description: Create a responsive client portal to allow clients to track their project progress and manage their accounts. The portal should include dashboard, file sharing, and communication features.

title: Q2 Marketing Campaign
description: Plan and execute the Q2 marketing campaign focusing on our new software solutions. This includes creating content, organizing webinars and coordinating with the sales team.

title: Staff Training Program
description: Develop a comprehensive training program for new employees. The program should cover company policies, technical skills, and soft skills development.

title: Server Infrastructure Upgrade
description: Upgrade the company's server infrastructure to improve performance and security. This includes hardware replacements, software updates, and migration of existing data.

title: Client Proposal for ABC Corp
description: Prepare a comprehensive proposal for ABC Corp including project scope, timeline, cost estimates, and implementation plan. Coordinate with the technical team for accurate specifications.

title: Quarterly Financial Report
description: Prepare the Q1 2025 financial report including revenue analysis, expense breakdown, profitability metrics, and projections for Q2. The report should be ready for the board meeting.
